nodes.title: How I use Git
nodes.excerpt:
Nowadays almost every software engineer is using Git as a version control system for their projects.
There are a lot of GUI apps for working…
nodes.description: My daily use of Git. What Git commands I usually use. Tips and tricks that I use every day.

nodes.title: Building a command-line time tracker
nodes.excerpt:
I started working on a project and I wanted to track the time that I spend.
I searched and found desktop apps, websites, browser extensions…
nodes.description: This is my attempt to create a simple time tracker from the command line
